20.eng-name: The Book on Vows and Oaths
20.ara-name: كتاب النذور والأيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Umar:That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) came across 'Umar while he was on his mount, and he was swearing by his father. So the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Verily Allah prohibits you from swearing by your fathers. So let the one who swears, swear by Allah, or be silent

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْحَلِفِ بِغَيْرِ اللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It being Disliked To Swear By Other Than Allah
